name: KANSAS HEALTH INSTITUTE
sampleDescriptions: Providing information to Congress researched by the Kansas Health Institute on Kansas' health and demographic statistics.
Informing House and Senate offices of KHI's products and reports.  Inviting staff and members to an upcoming event on Kansas' health demographics.
Informing House and Senate offices of KHI's products and reports.  Inviting staff and members to an upcoming event on Kansas' health demographics.  Hosting event for KHI on Capitol Hill
